references.reason: This paper introduces Neural ODEs, a crucial technique used in the proposed GEPS framework for solving parametric PDEs.
This paper provides a related method for solving PDEs using message passing neural networks, which is compared against GEPS in the experiments.

references.paper_title: Fourier neural operator for parametric partial differential equations
references.reason: This paper introduces Fourier Neural Operators (FNOs), a neural network architecture used as a baseline for comparison in the GEPS method evaluation.

references.paper_title: Augmenting physical models with deep networks for complex dynamics forecasting
references.reason: This paper presents a hybrid approach that combines physical models with neural networks for forecasting, a similar concept to the physics-aware version of GEPS.

references.paper_title: Generalizing to new physical systems via context-informed dynamics model
references.reason: This paper introduces an adaptive conditioning method, which is directly related to the core concept of the GEPS approach and provides a relevant baseline for comparison.
